entry.title: Re @0xMert_ Sunlight, cold exposure and lifting weights is great. But in terms of drinks to replace coffee or tea with: hands down cacao. research eff...
entry.summary: Re @0xMert_ Sunlight, cold exposure and lifting weights is great. But in terms of drinks to replace coffee or tea with: hands down cacao. research effects of theobromine, negligible amount of caffeine. Great antioxidant properties. No crash after, and increased focus/energy lasts longer.
